caption.p: ( A). LSVs for ORR and OER kinetics at various electrodes recorded in O 2-saturated 0.1 M KOH; Scan rate: 20 mV s −1; Rotation speed: 1600 rpm, ( B). CVs for ORR and OER kinetics using ( a) GNS, ( b) LCFM(5555)-gly/GNS and ( c) LCFM(8255)-gly/GNS-based Li-O 2 cells in 1 M LiTFSI-TEGDME + 0.5 M LiI at a scan rate of 1 mV s −1, ( C). EIS data for electron transfer properties of ( a) GNS, ( b) LCFM(5555)-gly/GNS and ( c) LCFM(8255)-gly/GNS-based Li-O 2 cells.
